channel.title: How to make a server save more frequently?
channel.description:
[b]I need to know how to make my server save more frequently[/b] [i]if anyone could help , i would be forever greatful and put your name in the credz of the server [/i] :D
Thank you

item.title: How to make a server save more frequently?
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

Search MoreINFO in client.java scroll up and see something like >=1000 change that to what ever you want (If you havent touched your server class then it’ll add 1 to the timer every 500ms so it should save every 500seconds like that…
Lower it to something like 100

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a server save more frequently?

item.title: How to make a server save more frequently?
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

If it’s a 317, then maybe client, if not that then maybe another class that handles player saving.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a server save more frequently?
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

find the timer of where it saves and change that to make it shorter, or you could make a button or command that people can press or use to save everyone’s game.

Read full topic

can you help?
